# Data Collection

## Considerations

A. Data Size
  1. How much is needed? - Power Analysis
  2. Dimensionality
B. Collection Strategies
  1. Complete dataset
  2. Sample from complete dataset
  3. Sample from data stream
C. Data use agreements
  1. Medical data (HIPAA regulations)
  2. Private collaborations
  3. Proprietary business data (MOUs)
